properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ
FROM VESSEL SHORTHORN EXPRESS IN
38-08.33N 055-46.01W AT 110355Z JAN.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO U.S. COAST GUARD BOSTON,
PHONE: 617 223 8555,
E-MAIL: RCC BOSTON@USCG.MIL.
